sentence: Charlie Sykes, the Milwaukee-based anti-Trump conservative editor, put it bluntly: Mandela Barnes is the way to keep that seat Republican.? Republican Sen. Patrick J. Toomey is retiring in Pennsylvania and neither party has a clear edge or an easy path in the race to succeed him.
title: Opinion: These maps show where Democrats are losing ground in the fight for Senate control
